free_text.Learning outcomes: To lay the foundations of some advanced topics in group theory and representation theory
free_text.Content: The topics treated  vary each semester and cover material that is not treated in master courses. After introductory lectures, the participants present in detail the chosen material. [br/][br/]Topics : modular representation theory, structure theory of semisimple algebraic groups, complex reflection groups, cohomology of groups, etc.
free_text.Note: This course can be taken independently of "Group Theory Seminar I" [br/]

free_text.Remarque: This course can be taken independently of "Group Theory Seminar I"
